Name: Of Guards And Thieves
About the game: Of Guards and Thieves is a multiplayer stealth game in which high-powered guards face off against fast and elusive thieves in a contest of wits. Outsmarting the enemy and shooting your way through to the goal are equally valid strategies. A game with simple rules, emergent gameplay and high replayability, Of Guards and Thieves is sure to be a showstopper in your gaming collection! KEY FEATURES: - Asymmetric Stealth multiplayer tactical action. - Easy to play, hard to master! - Lots of Operators with unique Gadgets, Weapons, and play style. - Huge selection of Competitive and Fun game modes. - Innovative Dynamic Lighting System. - Interactive Environment. - Rich and Deep Tactical Teamplay! - Customizable Operators and Weapon's esthetics. - Map Workshop with thousand of user-made maps to explore! - Dedicated server - Enjoy the game on our 24/7 dedicated servers, bigger game, less lag, more fun! - Private lobby hosting to have fun with your friends. - Leveling System with experience points and 80 unlockable levels.
